mapper.select: select sael.examine_time as examineTime , sael.examine_status,sau.realname ,sau.user_id,sau.img from wk_crm_examine_log as sael LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = sael.examine_user where sael.record_id = #{recordId} and sael.examine_status = #{status} and sael.is_recheck != 1
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, realname ,img, 6 as examine_status, 5 as stepType, #{examineTime} as examineTime from wk_admin_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

select create_user, sau.realname as examineUserName , sau.user_id , sau.img, aser.create_time as examineTime, 6 as examine_status from wk_crm_examine_record as aser LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = aser.create_user where record_id = #{recordId}

select sael.examine_time as examineTime , sael.examine_status,sau.realname ,sau.img , sael.log_id from wk_crm_examine_log as sael LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = sael.examine_user where sael.record_id = #{recordId} and sael.is_recheck != 1 order by sael.create_time

select sael.examine_time as examineTime , sael.examine_status,sau.realname ,sau.img , sael.log_id from wk_crm_examine_log as sael LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = sael.examine_user where sael.log_id =#{id} and sael.is_recheck != 1 order by sael.create_time

select sael.examine_time as examineTime , sael.examine_status,sau.realname as realname , sau.user_id , sau.img from wk_crm_examine_log as sael LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = sael.examine_user where record_id = #{recordId} and examine_step_id = #{stepId} and sael.is_recheck != 1 order by sael.create_time
SELECT DISTINCT saud.user_id, saud.realname , 0 as examine_status from wk_admin_user as sau LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as saud on saud.user_id = sau.parent_id WHERE sau.user_id = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, realname ,img, 0 as examine_status from wk_admin_user WHERE user_id = #{id}

select sael.order_id as order_id , sau.user_id , sau.realname , sau.img ,sael.examine_status,sael.examine_time,sael.remarks from wk_crm_examine_log as sael LEFT JOIN wk_admin_user as sau on sau.user_id = sael.examine_user where sael.record_id = #{recordId} AND sael.examine_status not in (0,5) order by sael.create_time
select * from wk_crm_examine_log where record_id = #{recordId} and examine_step_id = #{stepId} and examine_user = #{userId} and is_recheck = 0
select * from wk_crm_examine_log where record_id = #{recordId} and examine_status = 0 and examine_user = #{userId} and is_recheck = 0 limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wk_crm_examine_log WHERE record_id = #{recordId} and examine_step_id = #{stepId} and examine_status != 2
SELECT * FROM wk_crm_examine_step WHERE examine_id = #{examineId} and step_num = ((SELECT step_num FROM wk_crm_examine_step where step_id = #{stepId}) + 1) limit 0,1
select * from wk_crm_examine_log where record_id = #{recordId} and examine_status = 0 and is_recheck = 0
